sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --disable-static: This switch prevents the building of the static library.
--enable-http: This switch adds support for HTTP.
--enable-default-catalog=/etc/sgml/catalog: This switch sets the path to our centralized catalog.
--enable-default-search-path: This switch sets the default value of SGML_SEARCH_PATH.
--datadir=/usr/share/sgml/openjade-&openjade-version;: This switch puts data files in /usr/share/sgml/openjade-&openjade-version; instead of /usr/share.

ln -sf openjade /usr/bin/jade ln -sf libogrove.so /usr/lib/libgrove.so ln -sf libospgrove.so /usr/lib/libspgrove.so ln -sf libostyle.so /usr/lib/libstyle.so These commands create the Jade equivlents of OpenJade executables and libraries.
